website_summaries.verdict: The Keds Craze II exemplifies best the laidback style of the pioneering American footwear brand. The clean tone, simple stitching accents, and durable outsole of the Keds Craze II is reason enough for many women to cop a pair.This low-top sneaker takes pride in comfortable Ortholite insoles and soft fabric lining that pampers the feet with plush cushioning for hours. It retails at an affordable $45 making this a suitable option for budget-savvy sneakerheads who want to look for classy shoes with a timeless style.
pros: A good number of users of the Keds Craze II have felt comfortable the moment they first stepped into the Ortholite sole as the comfy feeling last all day
Numerous buyers say the $45 price is very pocket-friendly for an everyday wear sneaker
An overwhelming number of reviewers say the Keds Craze II is a stylish and classy option that it becomes versatile footwear that suits with plenty of casual clothing
Several customers are pleased with their purchase and consider this shoe as value for money
Some wearers say the casual sneaker is very rigid, durable, and long-lasting
A few users with wide feet say the canvas sneaker is roomy even for those with wide feet
A lot of customers say that the footwear has been an excellent option for activities that involve plenty of walking around the city because of the lightweight material
Several users say the removable insoles of the Keds Craze II make it an excellent buy for those who want to replace them with orthotic inserts
cons: Some users disclose having difficulty in keeping the Keds Craze II clean specifically the white canvas sneakers because spot cleaning does not work and placing them in the washer results to unwanted stains on the soiled canvas material
Some loyal customers of Keds notice that the Keds Craze II is a bit heavier compared to other Keds shoes released by the company
A couple of commenters complain that it bothers them that the canvas material rubs into the back heel because of the shoe’s tight fit

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very tight
customer_reviews.text: I gave these 4 stars because I feel they run very small. I have an older pair and they fit nothing like the new pair. I have plenty of room in my older pair so I was disappointed in the change of fit. These were also very narrow. These are definitely not for a wider foot.I sent them back. They are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: PhylR

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive shoe, but not what I've gotten use to with Keds. It's heavy versus the ultra-lightweight Keds that I've gotten used to wearing. So I returned it and got the Craze T. This and the Craze T are very, very similar in style. I like them both, but..., the Craze II is just slightly heavier than the 9oz Craze T. Of course this is not TOO heavy. It's a good shoe. I just like the ultra-lightweight that Keds has been generating lately.
customer_reviews.author: monty99

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and available in wide!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you so much for these! I will definitely be looking for a couple of more colors soon of these shoes. The original insole is removable and is comfortable! But I needed to remove them because my Dr. has me wearing special insoles. I also needed a nice looking shoe I could wear at work or casual that was a Wide fit. They do fit and the shoe is very comfortable and I'm happy with these as it accommodates my mild bunion, insoles from the Dr. and my flat feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Comfortable, True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with these shoes. I am typically a size 9 (occasionally an 8.5), regular width feet. I ordered these in a 9 and they are perfect! I was worried about the toe box because I have long, skinny toes but these are roomy enough while being true-to-size. I am really happy with these! They aren't too narrow, so they don't look like the old grandma Keds to me, but they aren't chunky looking like Vans/skate shoes. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear 7.5, but with Keds I wear a 7
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two pairs of Keds Craze sneakers and one pair of Keds canvas slip-ons, all of which are size 7. I usually wear a 7.5 in sneakers and other closed-toe shoes, but in my experience Keds' size 7 sneakers are a better fit for me than their 7.5 size. Both pairs of my Craze sneakers initially felt a little tight, but after about three weeks of consistent use, I find that they become very comfortable. My first pair was brown, and I've had those for a year without any issues; I decided to order these so that I'd have a black pair as well.The build quality is the same between both pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this is the classic Keds except the cushioning is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: JVictor

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on at an actual store before buying online. The fit is great. My only complaint is that the tongue moves and doesn't stay centered which can cause discomfort. I fixed this by crossing the laces under the Keds logo patch on the tongue. now the tongue stays in the center where it should be. Overall very comfortable for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Bauer

customer_reviews.title: No ortholite insole?
customer_reviews.text: Actual Product description Jersey lining, ortholite + memory foam footbed, sport inspired foxing, padded foam color, t-toe upper I ordered these shoes because they were advertised as having an ortholite +memory foam insole. There is very little cushion to these shoes. I have ordered these before in navy and black and they were very comfortable. I don't know what they did different on these shoes, but I will never buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and affordable. Wear all the time to walk the dog and run errands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds!! When I opened the box upon arrival it was very clear that the shoes had been worn. The right shoe was stretched out and when I looked at the sole it was dirty. They are now in a box to be sent back. Usually Amazon is pretty on top of things in my experience. Not this time.
customer_reviews.author: mamtelli

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. Good for swing dancing.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are have more padding in the soles than regular Keds. I find them more comfortable for wearing to work. The soles of the shoes are enough like the originals that I can still dance in them. They are slightly heavier than the original, which has provided some extra warmth for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Caryn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.  Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn these shoes everyday since I received them last week. I have wide, fat feet, so they are a little snug, but I’m still breaking them in. Spent all day Saturday Prom dress shopping with my daughter and my feet weren’t killing me at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: kandacetb

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Nice color, good value for the price, they fit well, and they have a great, cushy insole. Wore them all day twice and they're extremely comfortable. I've always loved Keds. I ordered the same shoes in black also.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. KochTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: This pair were 1/2 inch shorter than my other Keds shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was 1/2 inch shorter than my other Ked shoes. I wear 8 1/2 and order 8 1/2. I received an 8 1/2 I have 4 or 5 other pairs of ked shoes and this pair are too short. I love Keds’s
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My fav go-anywhere walk anywhere shoe. Comfy, goes well with all my jeans. I have several pair in different colors. Blue is the one I wear the most. Will buy them everytime they are on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but has problems
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shoe, however, it runs very wide. There is also an issue with your heel area. So far I have tried an insert that fits in the heel area that raises your heel up so that the back of the shoe does not touch the bottom of your ankle. I have also tried fitting a back of heel cushion that stops foot from slipping and sliding. May have to return
customer_reviews.author: jo baker

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sneakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfectly. I love the style with the stitching on the toe. Everyone remarks about how nice they look. My left leg was amputated in July so I feel safer attempting to walk with shoes that tie. Tried Nike and gave them away. Can't find anything wrong with these shoes. I wish I could find them in red and beige. I already have navy blue, black, gray and white.
customer_reviews.author: Westie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for casual walking
customer_reviews.text: Fit true to size. Take size 8 and these fit perfectly. Very comfortable and great quality as is true for all Ked shoes I have purchased. They also clean up well with damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: MaryWhite533

customer_reviews.title: Uncleanable.
customer_reviews.text: They got dirty in a strange pattern the first day -- almost like a manufacturing error that made them become dirty in a very specific spot. I have tried to clean them with no real success. They are comfortable, but now they're junk after only a week.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Keds and they won't be my last. I think I'm hooked for life. I don't know how I got this far in life having never owned a pair. I feel like I missed out. I have to buy more to make up for it now.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker is exactly what I was looking for but I must be between sizes - the next size up was huge and the size down was too small. Still, the back of my foot can come out of the shoe, so size is a bit off.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Third Times a Charm
customer_reviews.text: Third times a charm. This is the third pair of sneakers I've ordered this past week - had to return the first two. These fit perfectly. They are also very well constructed and look great. They're also deep enough for my inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Keds
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really comfy. I have a hard time finding shoes that fit really well. Keds never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: UNCOMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.text: The top portion of the sneaker is too stiff. The tongue also comes up a bit higher than my other Keds and it is also stiff and kinda presses into your foot. I was disappointed these were not more comfortable. They do run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute. I have wider feet than average so they are a tad more snug than most people experience. However I’m used to it so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: look very nice and stylish
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice and stylish, just a little bit tighter than a normal size. Not even sure you really need a half size longer, may be more reasonable to order a wider option, depending on your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Vu

customer_reviews.title: they dont look like the photo
customer_reviews.text: the photo looks sporty, these are just like an orthopedic ked. they are comfy, but don't let the photo fool you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shoe for summer
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear sandals so was looking for a little lightweight shoe for summer. These work great and do provide some support.
customer_reviews.author: sljelm

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds and these are my new faves! Fit as expected and the memory foam makes them very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size larger than I usually wear in sneakers,but they are far too small: in length, in toe height, and cut too high under my ankle bone. A huge disappointment for someone who has worn Keds for many years. I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashcriss

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much!!
customer_reviews.text: I like this sneaker very much, it is comfortable and you can used it all day , nice look with jeans. The price is just right. This is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: In style

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers by Keds
customer_reviews.text: Very much as expected. Fits fairly well. They need to be broken in. I could recommend them. I do like Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia M

customer_reviews.title: No support
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is nice and true to size, but there is absolutely no support at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits true to size and it has adequate arch support. Feels good the first time you wear it. I would recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: You suggested to order a half size bigger from my last order. I did was you suggested but next time I will stick to my size 6. Love the style and comfort. Wish I had them in each color.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie D

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and they look great
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, really comfortable and they look amazing with jeans, leggings and even with a dress! excellent for fall.
customer_reviews.author: VeroChi

customer_reviews.title: Runs a tad small.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10.5, but I ordered an 11, and it fits like a glove. VERY comfortable tennies that I’ll wear a long time. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Check shoes for extra insole
customer_reviews.text: Giving one star because the Company needs better quality control. Bought these for the extra support but only the right show had the extra insert. Doesn't really help when when foot is higher than the other. Also shoes look nothing like the picture. Would not order these again
customer_reviews.author: gamer 847

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 8W and it is perfect. These are really cute with capri's and shorts. Very comfortable too, and they make you feet look small.
customer_reviews.author: BBmb

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I kept these shoes there were no support at all.
customer_reviews.author: MPC

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Very comfortable. Run a bit on the smaller size, but when I purchased the wide they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Rapp

customer_reviews.title: she loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 75 yr old mother, she usually buys her's at the dept. store. She said the band around the ankle was a bit higher than her previous pair and it's rubbing. Other than that, she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are a tiny bit tight and rub - just on the top of my foot, but if I wear little socks, it is much better. Really like them.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great item that i bought from Amazon. I love Keds!

customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! Great color. Great fit. Rounded toe box and I have a wide feet so it's great!

customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit as I expected and they are comfortable. I like the look and the lining of the shoe. I would buy them again.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Walked around at the art fair for over 5 hours in these. No problems at all. Comfortable fit.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty and
customer_reviews.text: I am wearing my Keds now and I have gotten so many compliments. Very Pretty and comfortable

customer_reviews.title: however I had bought the navy in the same shoe from another store and I love them so
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn them yet, however I had bought the navy in the same shoe from another store and I love them so, I have NO doubt I will love these too

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pair. Love the fit. Put them on and GO! No break in needed. Very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe

customer_reviews.title: I like Keds
customer_reviews.text: I like that they fit and feel as they should the only thing I don’t like is that they’re black and not blue. Blue was not available.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: I love Keds shoes and I’ve been looking for the grey color. Amazon had them in stock in my size which made me a happy shopper. Received quickly and fit perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Great Keds shoes!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Discolored shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived on time but I’m very disappointed with them! One shoe is white and the other shoe is yellow. I’m so disappointed as I was hoping to wear these shoes to my trip to Nashville. I guess I should have went to Kohls instead.

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love the appearance of the shoe, but since my foot size is between and 8 and 8.5 this shoe was too large and slipped up and down on my foot. It left my foot numb and hurt with each step. I haven't worn a flat shoe for awhile and this shoe is flat, not much heel. Returned them for a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Loved them and every year looked forward to getting a ...
customer_reviews.text: As a kid, wore Keds every summer. Loved them and every year looked forward to getting a new pair. Fast forward 60 years and here I am wearing Keds again. What goes around, comes around...
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: These were too small. Have a white pair that ...
customer_reviews.text: These were too small. Have a white pair that totally fit in size 10. Don’t understand why there would be such a difference?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have these shoes in navy and love them so much I needed to have a pair in black!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I had the blue ones and was very surprised at how comfy they were. I have a narrow foot and heel so shoe shopping is not much fun. But when I find a shoe that feels great, I want them in all colors!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good and I like the extra cushion compared to standard Keds.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A. Gipson

customer_reviews.title: I may buy another and keep in my closet for ...
customer_reviews.text: I may buy another and keep in my closet for when these wear out. I can wear these all day. I spend about 6 hours a day on my feet.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purchase, wonderful price, nice fit and Amazon even delivered them a day early.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable tennis shoes I have ever worn - ordered a second pair to keep in reserve!

customer_reviews.text: Love the color and design of the shoe. Very comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5 but I ordered a 10 and it was too small

customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, have a perfect quality, but a few heavy then I expect.

customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair! Love how they fit and so comfortable.!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like how these shoes look, but I wish they came in size 10.5.

customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit, support, & that the Keds are light weight.

customer_reviews.text: Loved the time on the shipping,quality of the shoes was just too big for me. I will order another pair..

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: material is good, however the fit is not what I expected ..

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy from SoftMoc
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy from SoftMoc. If you get the wrong size, you will have to pay return shipping. The shoe is great, but it runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These fit exactly as I had hoped. I wear an 8 and ordered an 8. Love them!

customer_reviews.title: small shoe
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are not comfortable. I wish I would have bought a half size bigger. they are small and tight on my foot.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: happy with this shoe. however, I have very narrow feet so some may find them a bit tight. have been wearing Keds for many years and sometimes have to return them for being too wide but I took right off with these. very satisfied.

product_meta.title: Keds Women's Craze Ii Canvas Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: East side, west side-you'll want to run all around town in this super-supportive sporty style. Widths available in white and navy Twill upper 5 eyelet lace up sneaker Ortholite® sockliner with antimicrobials for odor control Memory foam footbed for maximum comfort Soft breathable jersey lining Flexible, textured rubber outsole Care instructions: spot wash, air dry only
feature_bullets: Durable rubber outsole for additional comfort.
